overview:
We are a creative studio dedicated to technological innovation. A group of people passionate about technology who look forward to new human-machine interaction possibilities, and who see in 3D the future of the web: engaging, exciting and interactive.

The common trait of our team - made up of specialized technicians with more than ten years of experience in web engineering, graphics, video, computer programming, 3D and web marketing - is the passion for research and experimentation with new technology which allows us to offer solutions that are always on the cutting edge of innovation, with particular attention to functionality and usability.

Our view on innovation, at the very basis of our operating methods, is based on the idea that it is not just about creating new technologies but also about adapting existing ones to new, business-oriented applications.

We are passionate about video games, with a business unit specialized in the creation of various kind of games: educational, promotional or just for pure recreational fun, in the form of normal computer applications (PC & Mac), web applications or mobile solutions, also thanks to our extensive experience with platforms like Apple iOS and Android.

What we do?

We are technological consultants for business companies.

You just have to tell us what your particular needs are and we will suggest the best technological solutions to achieve your goals in the best possible way.

Our mission To innovate, to improve what already exists and to find new fields of application for technologies that can help you optimize and improve your business.
